turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Jenn! Please, do me a favor a place an order for pickup from the local Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! Will this be from the Starbucks on Wanaque Ave. in Pompton Lakes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that one exactly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! What are you looking to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, so it's going to do a Venti Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any milk or sugar in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, splash of 2% milk and 3 sugars.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about whipped cream? They like to put that on top.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course! Whipped cream on top!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, you got it. Are you sure you don't want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all. Oh yeah! Get yourself a coffee too!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you so much! I've been craving one of their iced coffees all day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, go right ahead and get it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I put this on the regular card that they have on file under your name?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the American Express.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it! I'm on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much Jenn!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so your drink is on order at the Starbucks on Wanaque Ave. It's going to be ready for pickup in 5 minutes under your name. Also, your receipt has been emailed to you!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much! You are the best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you!
